dmca.title: DMCA Notification
dmca.body:
We have received the following DMCA Notification from Linda Antonsson.
 
At this point you have two choices, 1) remove the work that the complainant is referring to or 2) Issue a DMCA Counter Notice.
 
Please let me know how you are going to proceed.
 

Allan Knight
==================================
Knight Web Services Inc.
web: www.kwsonline.com
e-mail: aknight@kwsonline.com
tel: (716) 566-7415 ext. 5
toll free: 1-800-733-0368 ext. 5
===================================
 
 
DMCA Notification

1. Identification of the copyrighted work:

The copyrighted work at issue is appears on this page:

http://www.hippoiathanatoi.com/Characters/Entry/Angharad/

The material can be found under the heading 'Desc'. It begins "Lustrous
hair so very pale" and ends "Completing her outfit is a dark,
knee-length cloak, trimmed with fur along hood and edges."

2. Identification of the infringing material:

The material that is infringing on the copyrighted work listed in item
#1 above appears on this page:

http://www.neverwhy.net/mbe/index.html

The material can be found on the right side of the page, slightly below
the square image. It begins "Lustrous hair so very pale" and ends
"Completing her outfit is a dark, knee-length cloak, trimmed with fur
along hood and edges."

3. My contact information:

Linda Antonsson
webmaster@hippoiathanatoi.com

4. Contacting information for the owner/administrator of the infringing
webpage:

The email listed at the page in question at www.neverwhy.net is
secondselkie@netscape.net. This is the only contact information I have
for them.

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.

Signed,

Linda Antonsson
